Job Details:

  • Location: Edmonton, AB
  • Salary: $53.40 hourly / 35 hours per week
  • Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full-time
  • Shift: Day
  • Start Date: Starts as soon as possible
  • Vacancies: 1 vacancy
  • Verified: Source – Job Bank #2772656

Overview:

  • Languages: English

Education:

  • College/CEGEP

Experience:

  • 1 year to less than 2 years

Responsibilities:

  • Tasks:
    • Hire, train, direct, and motivate staff
    • Market business services
    • Assist in product development and direct and evaluate the marketing strategies of establishments
    • Establish distribution networks for products and services, initiate market research studies, and analyze their findings
    • Plan, direct, and evaluate the activities of firms and departments that develop and implement advertising campaigns to promote the sales of products and services
    • Plan, organize, direct, control, and evaluate the design, development, and maintenance of Internet and Intranet sites to manage an organization’s Internet presence

Supervision:

  • 1 to 2 people

Additional Information:

  • Security and Safety:
    • Bondable
  • Transportation/Travel Information:
    • Public transportation is available
  • Work Conditions and Physical Capabilities:
    • Attention to detail
    • Fast-paced environment
  • Personal Suitability:
    • Excellent oral communication
    • Organized
    • Team player

Employment Groups: This employer promotes equal employment opportunities for all job applicants, including those self-identifying as a member of these groups: Indigenous people, Newcomers to Canada, Visible minorities, Youth

Who Can Apply to This Job? The employer accepts applications from:

  • Canadian citizens and permanent or temporary residents of Canada.
  • Other candidates with or without a valid Canadian work permit.

How to Apply:

  • By Email: jobsjasperliquor@gmail.com

Advertised Until: 2024-02-28
